context: The word 'mullu' in Estonian is an adverb meaning 'last year'. It indicates a time reference to the previous calendar year. In the example sentences provided, it shows its usage: 'L천petasin mullu 체likooli' means 'I finished university last year'; 'Mullu sai meie kool 100-aastaseks' means 'Our school became 100 years old last year'; and 'Sai mullu mitu esikohta' means 'Got several first places last year'.
